name: mr bones
reviewtext: what a wild ride, and i'd know all about that! it's me, mr bones, from memes. you know the one. anyway this isn't about me, it's about my glowing recommendation of the hit new action mmo rpg roguelite military farming simulator, skeleton puncher xiv! i genuinely feel this way, and would say the same thing if i wasn't #sponsored, probably!
